name: bittersweetly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel both happy and sad: The book might end happily, sadly, or bittersweetly. The song that he played for us was a bittersweetly beautiful ballad about growing old together. Related word
bittersweet
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough sad, the story is not a tragedy at all, but bittersweetly romantic. I think this is one of the most bittersweetly life-affirming choruses of any song. The film is so bittersweetly moving as it explores deception and self-deception.It is interesting to compare his art with his real life, which, bittersweetly, seems to have less meaning to him.
